update.foreach:
update synthesis
collid=#{item.collid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name=#{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
img=#{item.img,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sisbigtime=#{item.sisbigtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sisendtime=#{item.sisendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
limitcount=#{item.limitcount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
synthesized=#{item.synthesized,jdbcType=INTEGER},
userlimit=#{item.userlimit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
matsci=#{item.matsci,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.update: update synthesis set synthesized = synthesized + 1 where id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER} and limitcount > synthesized
